content: The patient reports experiencing chest pain for the past few days. The pain is described as sharp and is primarily located on the left side of the chest. It exacerbates with deep breaths or coughing (Line 2, 4). The onset of the pain was approximately three days ago (Line 4). The patient also reports experiencing shortness of breath, particularly when ascending stairs, but denies any nausea or sweating (Line 6). There is a family history of heart disease, as the patient's father had a heart attack at the age of 55 (Line 8). The patient has not traveled recently (Line 8).

line_references.text: I've been experiencing chest pain for the past few days.
It started about three days ago. It's a sharp pain, mostly on the left side of my chest. It gets worse when I take deep breaths or cough.
Yes, I've been feeling short of breath, especially when I walk up stairs. No nausea or sweating though.
My father had a heart attack when he was 55. I haven't traveled recently.

factual_consistency_details.justification: The generated content is perfectly consistent with the source transcript. Each statement in the generated content is directly supported by the source transcript, and all line references are accurate. There are no unsupported or contradictory statements, resulting in a factual consistency score of 10 and a low hallucination risk.
